title: Mass of object after collision from velocity graph

content.question: Which block has the greater mass, and what information indicates this?

choices.label: Block 1, because it had a greater speed before the collision.
Block 1, because the velocity after the collision is in the same direction as its velocity before the collision.
Block 2, because it had a smaller speed before the collision.
Block 2, because the final velocity is closer to the initial velocity of block 2 than it is to the initial velocity of block 1.

content.answer: Block 2, because the final velocity is closer to the initial velocity of block 2 than it is to the initial velocity of block 1.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
